ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: If this course is taught again, I would definitely recommend it to people working in paleoclimate and paleoclimate-related fields.

Good summary of cutting edge paleo temperature tools out there including newest findings and foundational theory needed to understand the techniques. Recommend for sure if wanting to do paleo linage research and don't know what techniques are out there or if just wanted to get a broader sense of the whole field.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: My depth of understanding of the mechanics, promise, and limitations of paleoclimate proxies was much improved.
I know have the framework to teach my own class on this topic!
